titles: The true gaine more in worth then all the goods in the world.
author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
notes: Running title reads: Christ the true and perfect gaine.
Errata on recto of H5, final leaf.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Devotional literature --  Early works to 1800.
